Make decisions via the objects in Map and return error messages if validates failed, the key of the map element can be the validation entityId configured in validation files.

digest(Map<String, Object>, String) - Static method in class com.unibeta.vrules.tools.Java2vRules
Powers the strictest rules' configuration file via the given Map types objects, digest the java class to vRuels.
The default contexts would be the map key and object's class type.
The default object id would be the simple class name as well.
